3.2.1. File menu

 
The File menu contains the following Main Actions:
 
Fig. 3.2.1. File menu actions

New

Used to create a new crossword from a file, scheme or pattern setting. See Creating a new crossword.
Top

Open

Loads a crossword from a file. See Loading, saving, reloading and closing crosswords.
Top

Save

Saves the opened crossword using the current location and format. See Loading, saving, reloading and closing crosswords.
Top

Save As...

Exports the current crossword to a different location and/or format. See Exporting the crossword.
Top

Reload

Restores the current crossword from its location. See Loading, saving, reloading and closing crosswords.
Top

Close

Closes the current crossword, optionally letting you save it if there are modifications. See Loading, saving, reloading and closing crosswords.
Top

Share

Lets you share the current crossword in social networks. See Sharing the crossword.
Top

Print

Opens the print configuration and print preview dialogs to output the current crossword to a physical or virtual printer. See Printing the crossword.
Top

Settings

Opens the Application Settings dialog and lets you configure various settings. See Application settings.
Top

Quit

Quits the application, optionally letting you save it if there are modifications.
Top
 Tweet
